gto.ae.quests.0BC456B4331C09F5.descripti: Support &l&eComplete isolation between Patterns&r&r, no more worries about mixing up recipes!
With special optimizations, recipe processing performance is better than normal hatches:

- Optimized distribution mechanism that automatically doubles internal patterns based on distribution quantity, enabling one-time complete distribution and significantly reducing performance consumption.
- Optimized recipe processing mechanism using native types, eliminating secondary conversions.
- Cache the recipe corresponding to the pattern and directly call this recipe next time instead of searching again.
Additionally, the Pattern Buffer retains all internal patterns when broken, no need to use &eEncapsulation Tape&r anymore!
Note that the Pattern Buffer and other input hatches are &eisolation-enabled&r by default. You need a &6Spray Can&r to manually disable isolation.

gto.ae.quests.2AA0714363BA85CB.descripti: Each &6Assembly Matrix Sample Core&r can hold &236&r &6sample patterns&r, equivalent to &24&r &6ME Sample Supplier&r or &21&r &6ME Expanded Sample Supplier&r.
&6Assembly Matrix Speed Core&r: &cMaximum of 5 effective&r cores used to accelerate the Assembly Matrix.
Each &6Assembly Matrix Synthesis Core&r can simultaneously execute &28&r &6synthesis tasks&r, approximately equivalent to &216&r &6Molecular Assembler&r or &21&r &6Expanded Molecular Assembler&r.
Each &6Assembly Matrix Speed Core&r can provide an effect similar to an accelerator card, &eMaximum of 5 effective&r cores.
&6Assembly Matrix Frame&r: Used to construct each edge of the Assembly Matrix, defining its size. The default outer diameter is 7×7×7.
&6Assembly Matrix Wall/Assembly Matrix Glass&r: Used to construct each face of the Assembly Matrix, fill the faces completely.
&6Assembly Matrix Sample Core&r: &cAt least 1 core must be installed&r to provide sample capacity for the Assembly Matrix, each core can hold 36 sample patterns.
&6Assembly Matrix Synthesis Core&r: &cAt least 1 core must be installed&r to allow the Assembly Matrix to perform synthesis, each core can simultaneously execute 8 synthesis tasks.

gto.beyond-the-stars.quests.153B839DC21B: To achieve the monumental feat of a manned moon landing, it is essential to follow the scientific principle of gradual and systematic exploration!
Before officially sending yourself to land on &eMoon&r, you need to build a complete technological development system of "unmanned exploration - manned verification - permanent dev".

Among them, launching a &6Planet Scan Satellite&r carrying a &6Planet Data Chip&r to the &eMoon&r is a fundamental strategic step. The unmanned lunar exploration project can systematically obtain key information such as the Earth-Moon space environment parameters, lunar gravity field data, and radiation dose spectrum distribution, providing data support for subsequent manned moon landings.
You must first launch a &6satellite&r to the &eMoon&r to obtain &6Moon data&r.
gto.beyond-the-stars.quests.15D4145A9704: This chip is the final product of the &e"Planetary Scan"&r mission, internally storing in non-volatile memory the complete gravitational field map, spectral mineral distribution, terrain elevation model, and potential landing site hazard assessment data of the target celestial body (such as the Moon).
&4Warning:&r This chip is a single copy and is the core of planning extraterrestrial missions. Loss or damage will invalidate the entire scanning task.

gto.beyond-the-stars.quests.1BD5CACCF079: Place &6Rocket Fuel&r, &6Tier 1 Rocket&r, &6Planet Scan Satellite&r, and &6Planet Data Chip&r into the &6Satellite Control Center&r, set the level to &21&r, click &eSet Off&r, wait for the rocket to return, bring back &6Moon Data&r, and use the &6Scanner&r to scan the data to &dunlock the Moon&r.
&eCongratulations, you now have everything needed for a manned moon landing!&r
gto.beyond-the-stars.quests.1D57ED21E8AD: You need to &6amplify&r all organs of your body to the &estandard level&r to withstand the effects of &dinterstellar turbulence&r.

Of course, every time you go to a new place, you need to check if the &6organs&r on your body have been amplified to the corresponding tier.
&o&8Performing surgery on yourself while awake is truly a bit eerie&r&r
We will ultimately decide our own path of evolution.

gto.gregtech_odyssey.quests.3BC9246D8FD4: Perhaps you have never heard of GregTech, or maybe you are a seasoned veteran of the mod. The questbook will guide you step by step through all the milestone stages in an easy-to-understand manner.
This modpack features &2significant changes&r in the progression compared to the original GregTech series, so following the quest book might be a good choice.

&7However, the questline does not guarantee the best process experience. As you progress, you will learn how to design and optimize your own production lines, which is the core fun of the GregTech series.&r
So what should you do first? Make flint tools and find a place near water to set up an early development base.
Press &e[Tab]&r to open the quest book anytime, anywhere. Most quests can only be started after completing the previous one.
&7&o&mAnd there are some hidden easter egg tasks&r
&4Do not&r stay up late and overwork, health is the foundation of success!!
&9&oOur journey is to the stars and the sea&r&r

&7&oIf you are currently on the main storyline and find this task impossible to complete, it means you haven't finished the onboarding training! Click the chain icon in the upper left corner of this window to go to the onboarding page.

1. Hold the Virtual Item Provider and right-click to open the GUI to place the item you want to mark (optional).

2. Connect the Supplier to the network, place the Provider in the Terminal, and it will automatically transfer to the Supplier, or directly place items into the Supplier to automatically convert them into virtual items.

If you are not familiar with the &6Clean Room&r, check out the multiblock structure in EMI, you can also check the next page for instructions

Let's build a 5x5x5 Clean Room first, you can expand it as needed later. Power it up and let it run until the cleanliness reaches 100%. If the cleanliness is below 100%, machines in the Clean Room have a chance to consume items being made, so you need to keep the Clean Room running continuously!

Any maintenance issue will lower the cleanliness cap by 10%. Use Maintenance Prompt Cover with Redstone Lamp to monitor your Clean Room, or use the Automatic Maintenance Chamber to avoid the pain of maintenance.
More advanced chips and circuits need to be made in cleaner environments, which is why we need Clean Rooms
This is an interesting multiblock structure, you can place various single-block machines inside to provide the &eClean Room conditions&r needed for recipes!

Clean Room is a hollow multiblock structure ranging in size from 5x5x5 to 15x15x15. The bottom of the Clean Room does not need to be square, rectangles can also be used. The top layer is made of &6Filter Mechanical Blocks&r, except for the edges, which are &6Plastic Concrete&r blocks. &6Controller&r must be located at the center of the top layer. If the length or width of the Clean Room is even, the controller can be placed on either of the center two blocks (or four blocks). The rest of the structure is built of Plastic Concrete blocks.
&e&nNon-top layer&r blocks can be replaced with any number of blocks:

An &6Iron Door&r allows you to enter and exit the Clean Room. Make sure to keep it closed, otherwise the Clean Room will lose cleanliness rapidly. &6Travel Anchors&r and &6Elevators&r can also be used, and if needed, they can even be &eembedded into the floor&r.

You can use &6Diodes, Item Transport Chambers, Fluid Transport Chambers, or Machine Hulls&r to automatically transport power and materials through walls. However, be very careful when updating your internal machines. You must remove the old machine hulls and cables, then replace them with new ones of a higher voltage, otherwise you will be very disappointed. If it is only for material transportation, then you don't need to worry about the voltage.

If you want to see inside, you can use &6Clean Room Glass&r. If you like, you can even replace all non-top layer &6Plastic Concrete&r blocks with &6Clean Room Glass&r to make it look like a white beach house. The power consumption of this multiblock structure is unusual, starting at 30EU/t then gradually decreasing. But even at 30EU/t, make sure to give it enough power, you usually use MV power. Remember, this only applies to Clean Rooms, not a general rule.

gto.hv.quests.7329A824F8F1CDFF.descripti: To achieve the feat of manned lunar landing, you must follow the scientific exploration laws step by step!
Before sending yourself to &eMoon&r, you need to establish a complete \"unmanned exploration - manned validation - permanent development\" technological development system

Among them, launching a &6planet scanning satellite&r carrying a &6planet data chip&r to &eMoon&r is a foundational strategic step. The unmanned lunar exploration project can systematically obtain key information about the lunar environment, gravitational field data, radiation dose distribution, etc., providing data support for subsequent manned lunar landing.
You must first launch a &6satellite&r to &eMoon&r to obtain &6lunar data&r

gto.lv.quests.23A116C4BAE96979.descripti: Essentially, the work speed of multi-block machines depends on the &6total power&r provided by the energy storage.
So there are two &buniversal&r ways to increase processing &eVelocity&r: increasing &eVoltage&r and increasing &eAmperage&r.
There are many other ways to accelerate machines, and the
in this chapter is one of them. For a complete list of acceleration methods, please go to

Additionally, installing at least &atwo&r&6energy hatches of the same level&r (current does not need to be the same) on a multiblock machine can trigger the machine's &6overclocking&r. After overclocking, the machine can execute recipes at &bone voltage level higher&r.
In the beginning, you need to install &atwo&r&6LV Energy Hatches&r on the &6Blast Furnace&r to boost to MV to meet the &eVoltage requirement&r for Aluminium.

However, I tell you that achieving the &6Steam&r you need at full power is currently impossible, so it's better to operate without overclocking.
&432Parallel&r is already sufficient, pay attention to &dExporting Size&r, if it's too small, it won't be able to execute certain recipes.

&6Steel Tank Valve&r's auto output needs to face downward, but the &6Large Steam Storage Tank&r has no place for the &6Steel Tank Valve&r to open downward. Therefore, you need to use a &6Steam Pump&r with &epipes&r to export steam from the tank.

gto.lv.quests.58434872C6EC4E32.descripti: There must be &eno obstructions&r (including pipes) within 3 blocks in front of the Muffler Hatch! Additionally, in the default configuration and on Normal difficulty or higher, the Muffler Hatch has a certain chance per second to produce ash. When the ash is full, it is also considered obstructed, causing the machine to stop working! Its salvage probability is the chance of &6not producing ash&r. The more advanced the Muffler Hatch, the more pollution it can suppress, resulting in less ash production. It also has a larger capacity, ultimately reducing the frequency at which you need to clean the Muffler Hatch.

It should be noted that, in theory, the &eSilencer Hatch&r cannot be cleared of ash&r by any means other than drones. However, aside from upgrading your Silencer Hatch, the &6Air Scrubber&r can also significantly reduce the frequency of cleaning the Silencer Hatch, alleviating some of the hassle...

gto.magic1.quests.04D9F6587EF8D9B7.descr: &9&aPotion Jar&f&r can store up to 100 potions. Use an empty bottle or Potion Flask to retrieve them.
Pixies will use these containers during auto Potion Crafting.
gto.magic1.quests.088FCB5267CB7A89.descr: This belt randomly grants short-term beneficial potion effects, with fluctuating potency.
gto.magic1.quests.0A1ABE9CF7740AAA.descr: &aRing of Reduced Consumption&f slightly increases Mana capacity and restoration speed, while reducing the total cost of spellcasting.
gto.magic1.quests.0B59E29219F4588C.title: Brown
gto.magic1.quests.0B61448F01656C1D.descr: &9Runes&r are important components for many high-level &dBotania&f crafting recipes, and must be crafted on the &aRunic Altar&f.

When using the Runic Altar, first place the required materials for the Runes on it. This can be done by &aright-clicking&f or directly tossing the item. The altar also requires a Mana supply, so ensure it is connected to a &aMana Spreader&f that receives Mana.
After placing the materials, hold the rod and hover over the altar to check the crafting progress. Once completed, throw the Livingrock into the altar and use the rod to collect the Runes.

Note: &aRunic Altar&f recipes use runes as catalysts that will not be consumed. Similar to &aPetal Apothecary&f, after completing a recipe, right-click the altar with an empty hand to automatically fill it with the items required for the last recipe.
gto.magic1.quests.0D330FAD6C993DBC.descr: This is the advanced upgrade version of Spell Books!
Increases overall Mana and Mana Regen velocity, and allows you to create and use Tier 2 Runes.
gto.magic1.quests.0E2AD156E5EF263A.descr: Requires an &aScribe's Table&f for spell inscription.
gto.magic1.quests.0F9DABC15ED589CB.descr: This miscellaneous flower is used to detect whether your &aMana Pool&f is in a profit or loss state.
Place &dMana Indicator Flower&r next to the Mana Pool and observe the color change: glowing red indicates the pool is in deficit, while glowing blue indicates a surplus!
gto.magic1.quests.111649D7E16D869F.descr: &9Spell Caster Wand&r can only inscribe a single spell, requires inscription via &aScribe's Table&f.
Wand spells must start with Projectile > Accelerate, and must be inscribed with no other release methods (such as Touch, Self, etc.).
This method can break through the limit of 10 spells. To use Break, simply inscribe the Break spell alone.
gto.magic1.quests.13D401048A926A74.descr: Magic line blends &aBotania&r and &eArs Nouveau&r two mods
gto.magic1.quests.13D401048A926A74.title: Welcome to the &a&dMagic Line&f&r
gto.magic1.quests.13ED9023E7486BCD.descr: It is not recommended to enable this ritual at home.
You can add fruits to the rituals to modify the center position of the Sky Stone.
gto.magic1.quests.14DB8A515CA50932.descr: All final effects on the sword will gain 1 level of Amplify.
When inscribing spells through &aScribe's Table&f, do not use form runes.
gto.magic1.quests.151648179684B088.descr: &aRunic Chalk&f is used to draw permanent Runes on the ground. These Runes will cast spells on creatures that pass over them.
To attach a spell to Runes, use a &aScribe's Table&f to inscribe the spell onto &e&aSpell Parchment&f&r.
Note: &aRunes&f need source energy to drive.
gto.magic1.quests.171A10E6B65F087D.title: Crystal Powder
gto.magic1.quests.177658CA70DB0C89.descr: &cEndoflame&r will absorb nearby dropped flammable items/blocks (absorbing them one by one), generating &bMana&r by burning these materials.
gto.magic1.quests.177658CA70DB0C89.title: Use &cFire&r to generate Mana
gto.magic1.quests.17D7D34F519F7E5F.descr: To craft the ultimate spell book, you need to defeat &e&aWilden Chimera&f&r.
This is a &aMagic Ritual&f&r that needs to be completed with a &9&aRitual Brazier&f&r.
gto.magic1.quests.18A2FBE2D4133FA2.descr: &aArcane Pedestal&f is an essential component for building &aRitual Brazier&f and using &aEnchanting Apparatus&f to craft items.
It is recommended to make 8 spares first.
gto.magic1.quests.18A2FBE2D4133FA2.title: &aArcane Pedestal&f
gto.magic1.quests.196C47DDEEE313B4.title: Purple
gto.magic1.quests.19D02325579F2AA8.descr: &aVolcanic Sourcelink&f generates Source by consuming combustibles. &aArchwood Trees&f produce additional Source.
During the combustion process, surrounding Stone is converted into Lava.
Generates &aLava Lily&f at the same time.
gto.magic1.quests.1C48F2612F2FA828.descr: &2&aMana Spreader&f&r guides Mana flow by launching &aMana Bursts&f.
Use the &2&aWand of the Forest&f&r to bind the launcher to a block and set the pulse direction. While holding the wand, you can also check the status of the mana buffer and &aMana Burst&f.
gto.magic1.quests.1C48F2612F2FA828.title: Mana Conduction
gto.magic1.quests.1D86B2E553503E53.descr: &aDominion Wand&f is used to control creatures encountered in the world! Each type of creature reacts differently to the Rods, so be sure to consult the worn notes!
gto.magic1.quests.1D86B2E553503E53.title: Summon Assistance!
gto.magic1.quests.205BBDFBCA582E3B.descr: &2&aWand of the Forest&f&r is an essential &dtool&f in &dBotania&f.
&a&aBind Mode&f&r is used to connect Botania devices. Sneak-&aRight Click&f the first block/flower, then sneak-&aRight Click&f the target to establish a connection.
gto.magic1.quests.205BBDFBCA582E3B.title: &dBotania&f's Universal Tool
gto.magic1.quests.2162EA0216E27D68.descr: Throw into the pool to charge/discharge Mana. Use &2&aWand of the Forest&f&r sneak + &aright-click&f to toggle mode.
Note: The slate will not disappear.
gto.magic1.quests.2162EA0216E27D68.title: Portable Mana Storage
gto.magic1.quests.227DBA8836021B0B.descr: Initial collection of Source requires &aSource Jar&f.
gto.magic1.quests.23ADD20D9B1AE0F3.descr: Use the &b&Pure Daisy&f&r to convert &b&aStone&f&r into &b&aLivingrock&f&r!
gto.magic1.quests.23ADD20D9B1AE0F3.title: &7Livingrock
gto.magic1.quests.271653DEE9363B28.descr: Use the &b&Pure Daisy&f&r to transform dirt into &b&aLivingclay&f&r!
gto.magic1.quests.28A1E86651472522.title: Black
gto.magic1.quests.295C77EEC89000FC.subti: Generate Source through creature death and animal breeding.
gto.magic1.quests.2A5BA479E707034B.title: Various Essences
gto.magic1.quests.2AB5A33EC30AEA86.descr: The probability mechanism of the cauldron is an intricate function, but you only need a few continuous recipe operations to obtain the solvent.
gto.magic1.quests.2AE020FE64D401F5.title: Green
gto.magic1.quests.2CBBE8EF07B1D3DA.descr: &b&aMana Splitter&f&r can split the incoming Mana Burst into multiple &aMana Pools&f.
&dSparks&r are used for directional transmission of &dMana&r, crucial in advanced &dBotania&r.
Place &aSparks&f on both the &aMana Pool&f and the receiving block to "wirelessly transfer" &aMana&f.
Use &2&aWand of the Forest&f&r Sneak-&aRight Click&f to remove Sparks.
gto.magic1.quests.2CBBE8EF07B1D3DA.title: Mana Container Regulation
gto.magic1.quests.2D0CF18C8B2ABB7D.descr: Placed near growing plants or saplings to generate Source. Archwood Trees provide additional Source!
Note: Bone Meal growth does not generate Source.
gto.magic1.quests.2D0CF18C8B2ABB7D.subti: Utilize Plant Growth to Produce Source
gto.magic1.quests.2F01BF021E1BE0A2.descr: Craft the &aBand of Mana&f with a Terrasteel Ingot to upgrade it to the &dHigh Band of Mana&f&r, increasing its Mana storage capacity by 4 times.
gto.magic1.quests.305EDB583A9380FC.title: This is a hopper.
gto.magic1.quests.3100458952FC0673.subti: Find twelve different eyes to open the portal to The End.
gto.magic1.quests.3100458952FC0673.title: Go to The End
gto.magic1.quests.3182E8AF755104E4.descr: When blocking damage, &9&aEnchanter's Shield&f&r grants the user temporary &aMana Regen&f and &aSpell Damage&f.
Additionally, the Lusitanic Shield continuously consumes the wearer's Mana for self-repairing.
gto.magic1.quests.32DF4BC46620F952.descr: Place the &d&aAlchemy Catalyst&f&r below the &b&aMana Pool&f&r to activate &9Alchemy&r, enabling item conversion (such as turning rotten flesh into leather).
gto.magic1.quests.33682F4B44950123.descr: For Magic, we need special Magic Wood!
gto.magic1.quests.33682F4B44950123.title: Archwood Trees
gto.magic1.quests.371E5E1E435E41AA.descr: To obtain &aMystical Flowers&f, craft &aFloral Fertilizer&f and apply it to grass blocks to grow &aMystical Flowers&f, or apply it to stone to grow &aMystical Mushrooms&f.
Recommended to use &eImbuement Chamber&r for direct production.
Once you have obtained all &aMystical Flowers&r, you can use the &eEnchanting Apparatus&r for mass production. You will need a super, super, super large amount of &aMystical Flowers&r later.
gto.magic1.quests.379AC75F99212089.descr: &9&aBand of Mana&f&r is a wearable &aMana Tablet&f, &aequippable&f as an accessory.
gto.magic1.quests.3A8286DF6F667F74.title: Orange
gto.magic1.quests.3C16EB51FA4CA1D9.title: Lime
gto.magic1.quests.3D4D88B8BE881351.descr: To cast more powerful spells, you need to use the &e&aScribe's Table&f&r to &aunlock&f new Runes for your spellbook.
Runes are divided into three levels, each requiring experience points and specific materials to unlock.

&aScribe's Table&f can also be used to inscribe spells onto &aSpell Parchment&f. Operation: Place the parchment on the table, hold a spellbook, sneak and right-click the table surface to select a spell.

When crafting Runes, hold the Tome and right-click the &aScribe's Table&f. Search for the target Rune, then click the selection button at the bottom. Right-click to input the required materials to craft the Rune. Use the Rune to learn it.
Note: The workbench can automatically extract materials from surrounding containers.
gto.magic1.quests.3D6CC306F06FEF34.descr: If you really can't find ore veins, you can use Marimorphosis Flower with Livingrock of the Converted.
gto.magic1.quests.3D6CC306F06FEF34.title: Elemental Magic Crystal
gto.magic1.quests.3D862A3D3F83CA26.descr: &9&aEnchanting Apparatus&f&rUsed to craft various items within the mod, requires source energy to operate.
This device is a multiblock structure, requiring an &aArcane Pedestal&f for crafting.
First, place the &aArcane Core&f on the ground, then place the &aEnchanting Apparatus&f on top of it. Finally, surround the apparatus with &aArcane Pedestals&f.
gto.magic1.quests.3D862A3D3F83CA26.title: &aEnchanting Apparatus&f
gto.magic1.quests.3FD702B5AB006402.descr: Have you ever thought about being able to hover and move wherever you go?
This belt grants you the ability to levitate. Activation method: Sneak while in the air (can be done while falling or jumping).
gto.magic1.quests.40BC67BDEE15D1DE.descr: To craft &aSource Crystal&f, place &aOpal&r or &aOlivine&f into the &aImbuement Chamber&f, and obtain it through the process of the Converted!
gto.magic1.quests.40BC67BDEE15D1DE.title: &5&aSource Crystal&f
gto.magic1.quests.41A0BE357C8A74E1.descr: &9&aAlchemical Sourcelink&f&r can extract Source from adjacent Potion Jars.
Extraction amount varies depending on the potion type and brewing complexity.
gto.magic1.quests.425EA283AFEAF3FA.descr: Crush &eLivingrock&r, &eLivingwood&r, and &eLivingclay&r, then mix with Steel Dust to obtain &aLivingsteel&r (Steel?).
gto.magic1.quests.441C0659ED28D935.descr: Crafting a Level 1 Rune requires consuming Level 3 Experience.
gto.magic1.quests.441C0659ED28D935.title: Tier 1 Runes
gto.magic1.quests.457DE8C154641437.descr: &9&aRitual Brazier&f&r is used to cast rituals and can also serve as decoration. To ignite the brazier, use a light spell on it.
Performing Rituals also requires &aArcane Pedestals&f. Due to the variety of ritual types, use &eTattered Notes&r to look up each ritual!
Hold the tome and press Ctrl on the &aRitual Altar&f to operate.
gto.magic1.quests.4C22BA5824662C7E.descr: Combine &4Redstone&r with &2&aMana Spreader&f&r to craft &9&aPulse Mana Spreader&f&r.
This device can be controlled by a Redstone Signal and will only emit a Mana Burst when it receives a Redstone pulse.
gto.magic1.quests.4CD0D7F570CCE809.title: &5Wilden Cycle&r   More &5 Wilden Tributes&r
gto.magic1.quests.4E02DC8A474A4A2F.descr: &a&aPure Daisy&f&r is one of the earliest magical flowers you can craft!
This flower converts &2Wood Logs&r or &9Stone&r within an 8-block radius into &2Livingwood&r or &9Livingrock&r respectively, with a conversion range of a 1-block radius area centered on the flower.
gto.magic1.quests.4E02DC8A474A4A2F.title: Our First Flower
gto.magic1.quests.4E9804ED6DE64BDF.descr: Aether Steam you will use a lot
gto.magic1.quests.4E9804ED6DE64BDF.title: Elemental Steams
gto.magic1.quests.502826CBF91585C1.descr: Eye of the Ancients - Found in Desert Temples.
Nether Eye - Found in Nether Fortresses.
Enchanter's Eye - Craft using vanilla Ender Eye and Witch's Pupil.
Cursed Eye - Found in fortress chests.
Exotic Eye - Crafted using aquatic items.
Evil Eye - Purchased from Master-level Cleric villagers.
Cryptic Eye - Has a small chance to be obtained during Enchanting.
Undead Eye - Crafted using undead items. The Undying Spiritual needs required for crafting are obtained by killing Skeleton Horses.
Cold Eye - Found in Snow Houses.
Rogue Eye - Found in Jungle Temples.
Black Eye - Found in buried chests.
Magical Eye - Dropped by Evokers. Found in chests within Woodland Mansions.
Lost Eye - Found in abandoned mineshafts.
Corrupted Eye - Found in Pillager Outposts.
Wither Eye - Dropped by the Wither.
Guardian Eye - Dropped by Ancient Guardians.
gto.magic1.quests.502826CBF91585C1.title: The End: Genesis
gto.magic1.quests.51162B9185A45BB1.descr: This bow can be inscribed with spells at the &aScribe's Table&f.
Consumes Mana to convert arrows into &aSpell Arrows&f, triggering inscribed spells upon hitting the target.
If there are no arrows, it will launch a zero-damage spell arrow; when Mana is not enough, it launches a normal arrow.
&9&aEnchanter's Bow&f&r can also use special amplify arrows to enhance spell power.
gto.magic1.quests.520E3DAD6C87B989.title: Magenta
gto.magic1.quests.5295793DD0FBEC3D.title: Pink
gto.magic1.quests.542C6D76B579886C.descr: When the Magic Flower completes its growth cycle, its petals can be used to craft Magic Fiber.
These fibers are used to craft various items, including your first set of Magic armor!
gto.magic1.quests.573838380230C65D.title: Yellow
gto.magic1.quests.5766C8B9E850C186.descr: To craft the Arcane Core material &9&aSource Crystal&f&r, we need to first build the &6&aImbuement Chamber&f&r.
&aImbuement Chamber&f consumes Source energy to infuse items. It generates a small amount of Source energy itself and can also use &aSource Jars&f as an energy source.
Some recipes also require placing &aArcane Pedestals&f around it.
gto.magic1.quests.586AF33A5298B77D.title: White
gto.magic1.quests.58EC47584C773B82.descr: Using the &aEnchanting Apparatus&f structure, we will craft the first seed—&5&aMagebloom Seed&f&r.
Used for cultivating Magic clothing materials!
gto.magic1.quests.58EC47584C773B82.title: &aMagebloom Seed&f
gto.magic1.quests.597E4D997A20736D.descr: Use the &b&aPure Daisy&f&r to convert Archwood Trees into Livingwood!
gto.magic1.quests.597E4D997A20736D.title: &2Livingwood&r
gto.magic1.quests.5CFBA24B3E0CDEDD.descr: Hold a Spell Book and press C to open the spell creation interface.
Each spell must contain a spell casting form. Initially, there are three basic forms: Projectile, Self, and Touch.
Effect determines how the spell takes effect, and a single spell can stack up to 9 effects.
In the beginner stage, you can use Damaging and Break Effects.
Select the form and effect combination, then name it to create a new spell.
gto.magic1.quests.5D60FFFB4D2F55F3.descr: Used to record a warp point for permanent warping, which can be used for cross-dimensional warping (you can also use other methods).
gto.magic1.quests.5E2AA5695D1F21D7.descr: &0&aBlack Lotus&f&r can only be found in chests and can be thrown into a non-empty &aMana Pool&f to infuse it with a large amount of concentrated mana.
gto.magic1.quests.5E2AA5695D1F21D7.title: Thaumium Mana Flower
gto.magic1.quests.60778D26C539B172.descr: If you already have a photovoltaic power station, open the UI and place a group of Flowers of the Sun, and you can use it to obtain Mana easily and quickly!
gto.magic1.quests.632BC46928CC9A8C.descr: Spells cast through this mirror cost less and last longer.
When inscribing at the Scribe's Table, do not use form runes.
gto.magic1.quests.63DD7F5A4441ACE7.descr: Crafting a Tier 2 Rune consumes Level 5 Experienced.
Both require &9Mage's &aSpell Tome&f&r as a crafting medium.
gto.magic1.quests.63DD7F5A4441ACE7.title: Tier 2 Runes
gto.magic1.quests.64D0E66CB4FBEC82.descr: To get started, you need to craft a &eBeginner's Spell Book&r.
This is where you create and store spells.
Press &9C&r to open the "Create Spell" page. There are multiple tabs on the left, but the main three are: Spell Creation, &aColor Picker&f, and Familiars.
This spell book only allows you to create and use Tier 1 Runes. To craft more powerful spells, you need to upgrade the spell book!
gto.magic1.quests.68CB1D1BAD343540.title: Light Gray
gto.magic1.quests.6A1C0B17B22CE50F.descr: &e&aAmulet of Mana Regen&f&r increases Mana Regen velocity.
gto.magic1.quests.6A1C0B17B22CE50F.title: &aTalisman&f
gto.magic1.quests.6B2A61833A05C56E.title: Light Blue
gto.magic1.quests.6B511C8B572E8940.descr: The energy bar at the bottom left of the screen represents your Mana Pool!
As the mod progresses, you can increase your Mana cap or Spell Casting efficiency through various methods. Upgrading Spell Books also enhances Mana!
gto.magic1.quests.6BE534E3FB9B483B.descr: Right-click in The End with a Glass Bottle to obtain.
Right-click to throw it onto stone, turning all stone within a 9 x 9 x 5 radial area centered on the landing point into Endstone.
A &bEnder Air Bottle&f can convert up to &e64&f &8Stone&f.
But if you are still unable to go to The End.
You can use Summoning Essence to craft Endstone.
Pure Daisy converts Endstone into Deepslate Cobblestone.
Will raise a small cloud of Ender Air,
Hold a Glass Bottle to collect it as a Bottle of Ender Air.
Can also use a dispenser with empty glass bottles inside to collect.
gto.magic1.quests.6CA3A5E801C82C19.title: Blue
gto.magic1.quests.6DAA82B5F94AF9F8.descr: &9&aJar of Light&f&r Summons floating light sources that orbit around the user.
&e&aJar of Voiding&f&r destroys picked up items at the cost of Mana (Filtering can be set).
Config Annihilation Item: Click the bottle with an item in the off-hand, or place the item after putting the bottle on a &aScribe's Table&f.
Must be in the hotbar to take effect.
gto.magic1.quests.6F3602F5600A6221.descr: Crafting a Tier 3 Rune requires 10 levels of Experienced.
Requires the &eArchmage's&a Tome of Spells&f&r to craft.
gto.magic1.quests.6F3602F5600A6221.title: Tier 3 Runes
gto.magic1.quests.70C5A902C0D26628.descr: Throw specific items into the &b&aMana Pool&f&r to infuse them with &9Mana&r.
Check the JEI recipes for the Mana required for each Item.
gto.magic1.quests.70C5A902C0D26628.title: Infuse Magic Materials
gto.magic1.quests.781B75C63237C8E3.title: Red
gto.magic1.quests.79BE48D56622542F.descr: Now that we have basic flowers, we can use the &9&aPetal Apothecary&f&r to convert normal plants into functional generating flowers!

To activate the energy of &aMystical Flowers&f petals, first inject &bWater&r into the Petal Apothecary. You can do this by &aright-clicking&f with a water bucket or directly tossing the water bucket to complete the injection.
To craft, simply throw the recipe items into the Petal Apothecary.&aRight-click with an empty hand&f to retrieve placed items.
After completing the first craft, &a&aRight-click with an empty hand&f&r within 20 seconds to quickly repeat the last recipe, making batch crafting convenient!
gto.magic1.quests.7A359C1F5E041C4F.descr: Now that we have crafted &bLivingrock&r, we can start crafting the &9&aMana Pool&f&r.

&aMana Pool&f is the core facility for storing Mana. When the pool contains sufficient Mana, specific resources can be converted into Mana-infused materials. To convert, simply throw the item into the pool filled with Mana.
To &bgenerate Mana&r, you need to craft a &2&aGenerating Flower&f&r, such as the &cEndoflame&r.
Hint: &aMana Pool&f can store 1,000,000 Mana. Hold &2&aWand of the Forest&f&r and look at the pool to check the current Mana storage.
gto.magic1.quests.7A359C1F5E041C4F.title: &bMana&r
gto.magic1.quests.7B3FAF5CA4DD217C.descr: By using the &aPetal Apothecary&f, we can create various flowers that provide assistance during adventures. These flowers are divided into two main categories: &9&aFunctional Flowers&f&r and &a&aGenerating Flowers&f&r.

&9&aFunctional Flower&f&r is a flower that assists with daily tasks. For example, the &7Hopperhock&r operates like a hopper, absorbing items within a certain radial range. Some &aFunctional Flowers&f require consuming &dMana&r to function.

&a&aGenerating Flower&f&r is a flower that produces &dMana&r in different ways. The most commonly used generating flower is the &cEndoflame&r, which generates Mana by consuming nearby combustibles such as Coal.

In this quest line, tasks with &csquare&r icons represent &aGenerating Flowers&f, while those with &9circle&r icons indicate &aFunctional Flowers&f. You can also refer to the &aLexica Botania &dBotania Chapter&f&r for detailed functions of each flower.
gto.magic1.quests.7B3FAF5CA4DD217C.title: Functional Flower and Generating Flower
gto.magic1.quests.7BFCD0822FC37F50.title: Cyan
gto.magic1.quests.7C757F654BD74016.title: Gray
gto.magic1.subtitle0: From the Flower Garden to the Runic Altar
gto.magic1.title: Introduction to Mana
gto.magic2.quests.02835A9B717F47AC.descr: Maybe you should... make a backup?
The Plot Breaker does not cause explosions but clears blocks, perhaps serving as a good helper for leveling terrain.
gto.magic2.quests.0331107259F7B68C.descr: After defeating the &9&aGuardian of Gaia&f&r, you will receive the &e&aGaia&f&r as loot.
Game difficulty and the number of participants in rituals will jointly affect the quantity of loot.
gto.magic2.quests.0331107259F7B68C.title: &e&aGaia&f&r
gto.magic2.quests.03C475ABEFF04DEF.descr: The prism redirects &aMana Spreader&f or entity that collides with it, making them face the block or entity that launched the pulse.
gto.magic2.quests.041B3B6736C62F82.descr: GTO Group harnessed Gaia's energy to develop time-jumping technology, condensed into this small bottle.
Time Twister can rapidly accelerate the processing of machines, but you need to ensure the power grid is sufficient. You wouldn't want to see all machines shut down due to a power outage, would you?
gto.magic2.quests.041B3B6736C62F82.subti: A time machine more high-tech than a bed
gto.magic2.quests.043E9E791712A441.title: Liquid Elements
gto.magic2.quests.04CE14D92603FC7A.descr: To continue the journey, you need to obtain &6&aGaia&f&r. For this, you must perform the &9&aGaia Magic Ritual&f&r.

Place 4 &aGaia Pylons&f around an &aactivated beacon&r and prepare a Terrasteel Ingot. After the structure is built, hold the Terrasteel Ingot and &aright-click&f the beacon while sneaking to prepare for a life-or-death battle.
gto.magic2.quests.04CE14D92603FC7A.title: &aSummon&r &5&aGuardian of Gaia&f&r
gto.magic2.quests.05FC584B28D957EB.descr: Obtain 4 &6Gaia Spirits&r by defeating Gaia to unlock the Gaia cycle.
gto.magic2.quests.05FC584B28D957EB.title: Gaia Spirit Cycle
gto.magic2.quests.0631F054A9B97A40.title: Various Runes
gto.magic2.quests.0948158C6F476C57.subti: &9You need imagination as boundless as the sky
gto.magic2.quests.0A202D5836DC88AC.descr: Mana Garden can provide a large amount of Mana.
gto.magic2.quests.0C557A9494F58400.descr: Causes &aMana Burst&f to generate decorative fire when hitting blocks. This fire only provides lighting effects and can be extinguished by other &aMana Bursts&f.
gto.magic2.quests.0D9354ABA2AE2A11.descr: &2Incense Stick&f can be infused with potions in the &aBotanical Brewery&f. Place it on a &9Incense Plate&f and ignite it with flint and steel to release the potion's effect in a 30-block &cRadial&f range centered on the plate, lasting sixty times longer than the liquid potion.
gto.magic2.quests.0E7E559F2750F7D3.descr: When using this component on a Mana Diffuser, it will only launch if the &aMana Burst&f can hit a creature or player.
gto.magic2.quests.0F02FE8BA89BCF34.title: &aGuardian of Gaia&r  3.0
gto.magic2.quests.129FF3CBED5CFF05.subti: &dYou need an imagination as boundless as the sky
gto.magic2.quests.12BEB76EB924379C.descr: Make &aMana Burst&f able to &cIgnite&f blocks, but ineffective against creatures.
gto.magic2.quests.14EB725643E9F8FE.descr: Allows &aMana Burst&f to push blocks like a piston.
gto.magic2.quests.182EBB06B81BDF98.descr: Drastically reduces the &aMana Burst&f's total Mana capacity, while greatly increasing its velocity and range.
gto.magic2.quests.1DCFC67A8E3DCA2C.descr: Similar to the &aAlchemy Catalyst&f, when the &9&aConjuration Catalyst&f&r is placed below a &aMana Pool&f, it unlocks cyclic conversion recipes.
gto.magic2.quests.1EF7664F5D8C5FF1.title: Open Warp Gate

gto.magic2.quests.4ECFB1256BD6A7AA.descr: &9&aCorporea Funnel&f&r is a simplified version of the item indexing system, which can request items from the network via a Redstone Signal.

When configuring requested items, place the corresponding item in the item frame on the block. If multiple item frames exist, the funnel will randomly select one. Rotate the item in the item frame to adjust the requested quantity.
For more details, please refer to the &a&aLexicon&f &dBotania&f&r.

gto.magic2.quests.5A7FF6D0AED656DC.descr: Shorten the &aMana Burst&f startup time when it begins to consume Mana, but it also slows down the consumption rate.
gto.magic2.quests.5CB5F4CD521F6361.descr: Using Elven materials, you can upgrade sparks with &dAugmentation Cores&r. Hold an Augmentation Core and &aright-click&f a spark to upgrade it. Sneak and &aright-click&f a spark to &aclear&f the augmentation effect.
Diffusion Augment: Allows sparks to draw Mana from their storage tanks, charging nearby Players' Mana containers.
Gathering Boost: Forcibly absorbs Mana from non-boosted Spark reservoirs.
Diffusion Augmentation: Distributes Mana from Self's tank to nearby non-augmented or diffusion-type Sparks.
Isolation Enhancement: Prevents this spark from interacting with Dominant/Recessive Enhancement sparks.
gto.magic2.quests.5CB5F4CD521F6361.title: Spark Enhancement
gto.magic2.quests.5EF08646D8F4C432.descr: Grants &aMana Burst&f the ability to &bPierce&f through blocks, but reduces its lifespan.
gto.magic2.quests.61CCD117B022983A.subti: &6You need an imagination as boundless as the sky.
gto.magic2.quests.634E71DBAE81D197.descr: Through &dBotania&f, you can use &9&aCorporea Sparks&f&r to build a &dCorporea Network&r above containers.

The network requires at least one &bMain Node&r &9&aCorporea Spark&f&r as the core, and can then be expanded with any number of &aCorporea Sparks&f. Sparks of the same color will automatically connect within an 8-block range to form an item network.

Sparks can only recognize items in the container directly below them and can only be accessed from the top. All items in the network can be accessed by multimedia components such as hoppers and indices.
gto.magic2.quests.634E71DBAE81D197.title: &d&aMultimedia&f Network&r
gto.magic2.quests.65238A6DCDDDFA0D.descr: Arrange 5 blocks of Livingrock and 4 blocks of Lapis in a checkerboard pattern, then place the Condensation Plate on the central Livingrock block to complete the build.
gto.magic2.quests.665B4A8FF5277316.descr: Causes &aMana Burst&f to follow a parabolic trajectory due to gravity, while slightly extending the duration before the burst begins to decay.
gto.magic2.quests.66F1609053B5407C.descr: Many accessories containing the power of &e&aGaia&f&r await exploration! Remember to check the details!

gto.magic2.quests.7440E522FC31C341.descr: &9&aCorporea Crystal Cube&f&r is used to display the total amount of a specified item in the network to which the Sparks above belong. To use it, hold the item and &aright-click&f the cube.
gto.magic2.quests.79A19D0B2F94EFDC.descr: Makes &aMana Burst&f automatically track nearby blocks that can receive Mana, while slightly reducing the pulse's movement &cVelocity&f.
gto.magic2.quests.7A82D66B1B138F0F.descr: Doubles the &aMana Burst&f's Mana capacity, but reduces transmission velocity and increases Mana loss over long distances.

gto.magic2.quests.7B95C7407A1F5550.descr: This component converts the &aMana Spreader&f's pulse mode to only emit a continuous particle stream instead of short pulses. It does not consume Mana. Perfect for decorative purposes.
gto.magic2.quests.7DF7F9CD9A795E69.descr: &5&aCorporea Index&f&r is the interface to interact with the &9Corporea Network&r, allowing access to resources on the network constructed by &aCorporea Sparks&f.

When used near the index, it will intercept nearby players' &achat commands&f. Players can request items by entering commands, such as typing &b10 &aIron Ingots&f&r. If the network has the item in memory, it will be distributed automatically.
For more operations, please refer to the &a&aLexica Botania&f &dBotania&f&r.

gto.main-stoneage.quests.00FC570B313227A: You want to know why we didn't cut the trees first——can you cut them?
gto.main-stoneage.quests.06FE84E75DBE704: The Advanced Terminal is extremely powerful; crouch and right-click to view detailed settings, which will be introduced one by one here:
&cMirror Build:&rClick the top right corner to select the level blocks to install, including but not limited to Glass, Heating Coils, casings, etc.
&5Number of repetitions of the structure:&rAffects the number of repeated structure layers in the multiblock, such as the length of the Assembly Line, the height of the Neutron Activator, etc.
eg. If you select a repeating structure of 15 when building the Assembly Line, it will automatically build a 16-slot Assembly Line for crafting recipes.
&eNo Hatch mode:&r When this mode is enabled, multiple functional hatches that could be placed on this multiblock will not be placed, while the unique functional hatch remains unaffected.
eg. When placing on an Electric Blast Furnace with this mode enabled, only the muffler hatch will be placed, not input/output hatches, etc.
&aReplace Mode:&rWhen enabled, using it on an existing multiblock will attempt to replace it with matching Level blocks from the inventory or AE system.
&bUse AE Items:&r As the name suggests, it uses AE items, provided you have a terminal and the terminal is wirelessly connected to your ME container.
&9Mirror Build:&rBuild the multiblock structure mirrored left and right.
&2Module Build:&r Only build the corresponding multi-block's accessory modules

gto.mv.quests.0D63E5A54480E693.descripti: Single-block Machine Force Amplifier, equivalent to reducing &eenergy consumption&r for single-block machines while providing &eadditional parallelism and velocity&r.
Extremely expensive, needs thousands of &bAluminium Ingots&r. Bring out all your reserves to treat it!

Some multiblock machines contain &l&6Integral Framework&r&r, which limits the &erecipe Level&r you can run. The actual operating Voltage of the machine will take the minimum of the Voltage provided by the energy hatch and the Integral Framework Voltage.
The Processing Plant is even more &especial&r in that you can only install energy hatches &cexactly&r equal to &6its Integral Framework&r, with no restrictions on power.
However, if you start now, you may only be able to handle &7LV&r-level Integral Frameworks. It is recommended to begin mass production during the &6HV&r stage.

gto.mv.quests.5ACCABFAB15E0A59.descripti: As the name suggests, a machine used for crystallization. &6Monocrystalline Silicon&r is a type of single element crystal

When molten silicon solidifies, silicon atoms arrange into a diamond crystal lattice to form a crystal nucleus, the nucleus grows into crystal grains with the same crystal orientation, forming monocrystalline silicon.
This process is generally called &eCrystal Pulling&r
Crystal formation generally requires &6Crystal Seed&r and &6Pure Saturated Solution&r, sometimes also &6Protective Gas&r

gto.space-station.quests.104B4AFDC1EB3C1: GregTech has provided substantial subsidies for the construction of the FIRST Earth Space Station to accommodate newly hired employees.
Each construction in space orbit provides &ea completed space station&r, &e4 Energetic Photovoltaic Power Stations&r, and &b80B each of Rocket Fuel/Distilled Water/Air&r.
Be careful when landing! Otherwise, &cthe landing hatch will directly damage the orbital space station&r.
Providing some &bDistilled Water&r to the forward-installed photovoltaic power station before startup ensures the space station's self-sufficient power supply.
As for the power supply for the machines in the space station... bring some &eBattery Boxes&r or use the &eRocket Engine Small Machine&r to generate electricity.
gto.space-station.quests.58EC0AFA9742164: This is a larger space station!
The internal space is sufficient to place &9IV Era&r &eIndustrial Large Machines&r
Both each space station module can also &6connect with other modules&r to expand the space and functionality of the entire space station.
In addition, by utilizing the unique environment provided by space, you can also build some hatches here to &6process materials that are impossible to handle on the ground&r.
Industrial Space Station's hatches are divided into three types: &cCore Hatch&r, &eModule Hatch&r, &aConnector Hatch&r
&cCore Hatch&r and &eModule Hatch&r can only connect to &aConnector Hatch&r
And the &aHatch&r can connect with the &eModule Hatch&r, as well as other &aHatches&r of the same type.
gto.space-station.quests.5FF554F6ADC5986: Space stations can perform the following functions while operating in space:
- Provides an &bOuter Space Working Environment&r for internal machines
- Provides an &bUltra Clean Environment&r for internal machines based on the type of installed Filtering hatch.
- Attempts to supply &ePhotovoltaic Power Plant Export Hatches&r installed on the exterior with &b8mB Distilled Water per hatch&r per second (Configurable)
- Provides breathable air for the player inside the machine

However, unfortunately, the operation of the machine &4is not free&r. Maintaining the internal environment requires a supply of &d1A EV/t of electricity&r, &6continuously consumes a small amount of resources&r, and also produces scrap.
gto.space-station.title: Celestial Abode
gto.steam.quests.0019A5EEEE514539.descri: You will need three: one for making &6Mold (Ball)&r, one for making &6Mold (Block)&r, and the last one for making &6Mold (Plate)&r.
Currently, molds can only be used in the &eAlloy Smelter&r. In later stages, molds can also be used in the &6Fluid Solidifier&r and &6Forming Press&r.
&6Molds&r are not consumed, meaning once you craft one, you can use it until the &bend&r&e of&r&2 the&r&c universe&r.
Meanwhile, &6templates&r can also be used to craft &6dies&r, but &cExtruder recipes&r that use &6dies&r start at LV level at the very least, and the vast majority of recipes are &4unusable&r at LV.
&4So make it clear, you are making a mold, not a die!!!&r
gto.steam.quests.0019A5EEEE514539.subtit: But good things come in threes.
gto.steam.quests.0019A5EEEE514539.title: The predecessor of the mold
gto.steam.quests.017D4D369784454E.descri: To make steel, you need a furnace capable of smelting it. To have a furnace that can withstand high enough temperatures, you need a sufficiently excellent shell material. For that, you'll need a &eForceful machine(?)&r to produce this material.
Obviously, the &6Low Pressure Steam Compressor&r will be more &6Forceful&r than manual compression... right?
Anyway, you need a &6Low Pressure Steam Compressor&r to help you prepare the firebrick, which is necessary for building the &6Primitive Blast Furnace&r.
gto.steam.quests.017D4D369784454E.title: Squeeze! Yeah! Squeeze!
gto.steam.quests.020E8B707A8CF794.descri: Oh? Are you planning to use this big guy?
You may need to centrifuge &6Air&r, &6Water Gas&r, and &6Minerals&r.
Centrifuging &6Air&r is one of your early sources of &6Oxygen&r, while &6Nitrogen&r can be used in the Electric Blast Furnace to &eaccelerate metal smelting&r.
If some recipes cannot be executed, remember to check EMI to see if the recipe requirements and output quantities are smaller than your input and output hatches.
&6Fluid Input Hatch (Steam)&r can only support &b16B&r of fluid input. After obtaining Steel, you can craft the &6Infinite Intake Hatch&r to utilize full machine parallelism.
gto.steam.quests.020E8B707A8CF794.title: Centrifuge?
gto.steam.quests.043FCD7B759853EA.descri: React the &3Raw Rubber Powder&r and &eSulfur Powder&r you obtained in the &6Alloy Smelter&r to produce &6Rubber Strips&r.

Of course, this method is relatively slow. When you reach the LV stage, you can use &6Chemical Reactor&r to produce &6Liquid Rubber&r, and then solidify it into &dRubber&r of any shape you desire using &6Fluid Solidifier&r.
But there's still a certain distance from LV, you still need to improve your current stage's productivity first.
gto.steam.quests.043FCD7B759853EA.title: Rubber, finally
gto.steam.quests.05EFB5D7ED8DE2D6.descri: You may need to use other machines from Ender IO, which can be directly connected to GregTech wires and operate using GregTech Electricity (EU).

gto.steam.quests.05F4015974079225.descri: Alloy Furnace, smelts &6three copper one tin&r into four &6Bronze Ingots&r, now able to efficiently produce various alloy ingots that can be made at LV

Despite this, the efficiency of the low-voltage version of the steam single-block machine is still not enough to meet your subsequent development needs, you should upgrade to &6Casting Furnace&r as soon as possible
Also, do not block the &4exhaust hatch&r; adjust it with your wrench.

So if you find it difficult to make superconducting wires, why not try the &1Power of Magic&r.

gto.steam.quests.21D331D7F4F8862C.descri: Here we need to introduce the new mechanism established by GTO: &5Vacuum Level&r

High Level vacuum level conditions can execute Low Level vacuum level recipes, but not vice versa&8&m(obviously)&r

Low-level vacuum pumps only need &6steam&r to operate, while advanced vacuum pumps require &6electricity&r. The space environment unconditionally provides &5Level IV Vacuum&r, and multiblock machines provide &5Level IV Vacuum&r through &6Vacuum Hatches&r.

gto.steam.quests.29A2859398D5B252.descri: A type of wire without resistance is collectively called &6Superconducting Wire&r
As long as the current and voltage accepted by the superconducting wire &eis less than&r the &dupper limit of current or voltage&r it can carry, it is absolutely safe.
&8eg. This task guide indicates that the superconducting wire's maximum current capacity is 1A/ULV, so the wire will burn out if it receives 2A/ULV or 1A/LV electricity.&r
&o means you can &a jump &r&6 on &r&e and &r&b off &r the wires

Of course, if you let the superconductor carry an excessive current, it will &4catch fire&r and &4burn out&r after a while. If the current far exceeds its carrying capacity, it will &4burn out directly&r.

gto.tips.quests.0B472475D703DE42.descrip: When viewing the usage of certain blocks (usually the controller), you will find a special page—&e"Multiblock Info"&r page.
This is specifically used to view the multiblock patterns that this block can build. There are two buttons on its right side: P and ALL.

- &bP&r toggles between different forms of the multiblock, defaulting to Form 0, i.e., &bP: 0&r. Typically, P1 for multiblocks with &evariable length&r is their &6longest form&r, while P1 for multiblocks with &eauxiliary modules&r is their &6auxiliary module&r.
- &bALL&r toggles the display of layers, default state shows all. Click to switch to &bL: X&r to display the structure of the Xth layer.&r

Directly &eclick, drag, zoom in/out&r to view the overall appearance of the multiblock. &eSelect a specific block&r and check in the upper right corner what blocks can be placed in that position, as well as the minimum/maximum number of blocks that can be placed. &cIf your multiblock is not forming but no blocks are missing, prioritize checking the block quantity limits!&r

When you open this page in the &6Pattern Encoding Terminal&r, you will notice an additional &bplus sign&r in the lower right corner, used to encode all blocks of the multiblock into a pattern. Click &bP&r to encode different configurations.
To check what multiblock &6hatches/parallel hatches&r and other hatches can be used for, also view their purposes.

The specific setting is located in the &e server save &r&bserverconfig&r directory under the file &bopenpartiesandclaims-default-player-config.toml&r, you can set &eofflineForceload&r to &2false&r to disable &e offline forced loading &r

gto.tips.quests.1777A96F556AE0F6.descrip: As everyone knows, Minecraft has a chunk loading mechanism. When a player leaves a chunk for some time, the chunk will pause loading—meaning the machine will stop running.
So to ensure your base operates normally, make sure all the chunks of your base are claimed and &c forced loaded &r.
&7Click to turn the page for operations &r
Press &[M]&r to open the map, then click or right-click to select the chunks near you, choose &[Claim Land]&r
Select your claimed chunk again, right-click to choose &[Mark Forceload]&r
&dNote: Do not claim chunks that are too far away, this is ineffective &r

gto.tips.quests.1A44A6A24FF9E7C3.descrip: Let's introduce from top to bottom:
&6Power Hatch&r: Used to control &eturning on/off&r, equivalent to right-clicking with a &6Soft Mallet&r.
&6Minimum Overclocking Time&r: Used to control the &bminimum time&r that a machine's &eoverclocking&r can reach. For specific mechanics, please refer to the overclocking introduction on this page.

&6Batch Processing&r: A new mechanism added by GTO. When enabled, the machine will &cattempt to use&r all materials in the input hatch and multiply the output time &bby&r the number of &erecipes&r executed. The maximum batch processing time is &a3600&r seconds.
&6Update Structure Check&r: GTO does &cnot&r immediately determine &ewhether it is formed&r after multiblock construction for performance reasons. You can click this button to check instantly.
In some machines, there is a button that can be used to &eadjust the machine's Max Parallels&r.

Also, &bGregTech &r has added support for viewing ore veins with &bXaero's WorldMap &r. Open the &e world map &r and click the &e Show GT veins &r and &e Show Basalt Fluid veins &r buttons in the bottom right corner to view the ore veins you've discovered.

gto.tips.quests.22D8BA3AB5A2C44E.descrip: The principle of the parallel hatch is to allow &emultiple processing&r of multiple raw materials. When crafting large quantities of recipes, the parallel effect means crafting &ax items&r, consuming &ax energy&r, and using &a1 unit&r of time.
On average per recipe, it uses &a1 unit&r of energy and &a1/x units&r of time. This effect is &6equivalent&r to lossless overclocking.

In the interaction between parallel and overclocking, the machine will &eprioritize parallel computation&r. If there is &esurplus power&r after completing parallel computation, it will proceed with overclocking.
gto.tips.quests.22D8BA3AB5A2C44E.subtitl: Mass processing is equivalent to lossless overclocking.
gto.tips.quests.22D8BA3AB5A2C44E.title: Parallel Hatch

- Chain hammers, mining hammers, electric drills when mining, chainsaws when cutting trees multiply the chain number by 4
- If it's an electric tool, it multiplies by 2^electricity level

gto.tips.quests.2574E6B85ADAAB88.descrip: You may have noticed that eating &athe same&r food repeatedly gives &cless&r saturation—this is the effect of &eDietary Balance&r!

After opening your inventory, an additional button appears below your crafting grid. Clicking into it allows you to view your current &enutritional status&r. When these bars reach a high value, you will gain some &badditional buffs&r. The only thing to note is &6sugar&r; when your sugar level is &etoo high&r, you will enter a state of &chunger&r.
You will also find that sometimes you get &esick&r, because your inventory contains &cdangerous substances&r. Discard them as soon as possible, or find a way to avoid getting sick.
gto.tips.quests.2574E6B85ADAAB88.title: Balanced Diet and Illness
gto.tips.quests.2AF1E09A346B5343.descrip: Overclocking, the most basic speed-up method. By increasing the input power, machines can achieve faster working speeds. &cOverclocking is unrelated to voltage, only related to power. &rIn the early game, overclocking is divided into &6lossy overclocking&r and &6lossless overclocking&r.

The vast majority of machines use &6Lossy Overclocking&r, which is also the default overclocking mode. For every time the energy hatches installed on the machine can provide more than &a4 times&r the power required by the recipe, the machine's power consumption increases by &a4 times&r, while the processing time is reduced to &a0.5x&r. As seen from the previous formula, the machine pays the price of speeding up by &closing&r one unit of energy.
④I installed 2 &e16A&r&8ULV&r energy hatches, so I provided a total of &e2A&r&bMV&r power, but the machine recipe voltage is only &7LV&r, &ccannot execute recipe&r

You must have noticed a bar in the bottom left corner of the multiblock UI called &e"Adjust the minimum time for machine overclocking"&r, which is designed to protect TPS. Its default value is &a20t&r, which is &a1&r second.

If the recipe's processing time during overclocking falls below this value, another mechanism &e"Compensated Parallelism"&r will take effect. It converts attempts to overclock to &bbelow the minimum time&r into &eparallelism&r, with each overclock converted into &a2x&r additional parallelism. This is why parallelism can be observed on small machines.

&6Lossless Overclocking&r is only supported by specific machines. For every time the energy hatches installed on the machine can provide more than &a4 times&r the power required by the recipe, the machine's power increases by &a4 times&r, while the processing time becomes &a0.25x&r. The machine achieves this speed boost without consuming additional energy.

Overclocking can be triggered &ean infinite number of times&r. If you supply 16 times the power to a lossy overclocking machine, it will perform 2 overclocks (&a4x4&r), and the time taken becomes &a0.25x&r; if you supply 64 times the power, it performs 3 overclocks and the time becomes &a0.125x&r.
&6Single Block Machine&r&cCannot&r normally increase the input amperage (default 1A), but can trigger overclocking by replacing with a &bmore advanced&r single block machine to &eincrease voltage&r.
Assuming I am currently executing a &bMV&r recipe with &6Lossy Overclocking&r
①I installed 2 &e2A&r&bMV&r energy hatches, so I provided a total of &e4A&r&bMV&r power, the machine can perform &a1&r overclock, recipe duration &e0.5x&r;

② I installed 1 &e2A&r&bMV&r energy hatch and 1 &e16A&r&bMV&r energy hatch, so I provided a total of &e18A&r&bMV&r power, but only &e16A&r will be used (because the machine cannot perform the 3rd overclock, requires 64A). The machine can perform &a2&r overclocks, recipe duration &e0.25x&r;

③ I installed 2 &e16A&r&bMV&r energy hatches, so I provided a total of &e32A&r&bMV&r power, but only &e16A&r will be used (because the machine cannot perform the 3rd overclock, which requires 64A). The machine can perform &a2&r overclocks, and the recipe takes &e0.25x&r time.
gto.tips.quests.2AF1E09A346B5343.subtitl: Energy Consumption = Power × Time  Power = Voltage × Current
gto.tips.quests.2AF1E09A346B5343.title: Overclocking!
gto.tips.quests.329F8FA702A2CB5C.descrip: &6Wires/Cables&r are your &eprimary means&r of transmitting electricity in the early game.

&eUntreated&r &6Wires&r have significant &cLine Loss&r (and can electrocute you). The &blonger&r the wire you lay, the &emore&r electricity is lost at the far end. When the wire is &ctoo long&r, the voltage may become &ctoo low&r, causing machines at the far end to not receive enough power to operate.

Applying &eInsulation&r to wires can significantly reduce line loss. However, the most recommended option is always &6Superconductors&r—&eno insulation needed, no leakage, and no risk of electric shock&r.
&o&7Do not let the wire bear more than the rated Voltage and Amperage!
gto.tips.quests.329F8FA702A2CB5C.title: Characteristics of Wires

gto.tips.quests.55CC8C2FD72F7E8B.descrip: &6Overclocking Hatch&r, one of the most proud creations of the &3GregTech Co. Ltd&r R&D Department. It can unconditionally adjust the &etime multiplier&r during each overclocking process.

Taking the &6UHV Overclocking Hatch&r as an example, after installation, each time &eoverclocking&r is performed, the time consumption will be reduced to &a1/3&r of the original. (Here, 3 is the number displayed in the Overclocking Hatch UI.)

Starting from the &6UIV Overclocking Hatch&r, the time multiplier has exceeded &a4&r, which means overclocking not only &esaves time&r but also &esaves energy&r. For the first time, overclocking has a &chigher&r priority than parallel processing. The machine will prioritize overclocking calculations before parallel ones.

gto.tips.quests.5C62ECF9AC84E023.descrip: There are several newly added cover plates in GTO, which will be introduced one by one here:
&b       Wireless Transmission Cover&r: Divided into &6Wireless Item Transfer Cover&r and &6Wireless Fluid Cover&r, along with their &dadvanced versions&r;
Feature: Provides an additional 18-slot storage space that can be opened in the GUI for a &csingle&r single-block machine; items are &4non-stackable&r.

Usage: Install on any side of a &esingle-block machine&r, &emultiblock machine controller&r, or &einput hatch&r; control the machine's on/off state by setting &4Redstone signal&r and Normal/Inverted mode&b.

Features: If the installed block also has &eElectric Pump&r, &eConveyor Belt&r, or other logistics hatches, the &6Machine Controller Cover&r can be set to control the &elogistics hatches&r; the &6Machine Controller Cover&r can be activated by strongly/weakly powered blocks.

Usage: Hold an &eOverlay Panel&r in your main hand, crouch and right-click on any container such as a &eSuper Chest&r, &eSuper Tank&r, &eME Interface&r, etc., to bind it. Then attach the &eOverlay Panel&r to the &eoutput port of a single-block machine&r or the &eoutput hatch of a multiblock machine&r to wirelessly transfer items/fluids.
Features: Supports &dCross-Dimensional Transmission&r; Advanced version can install &eFilter Cards&r.

Usage: After building the &6Wireless Charger&r structure, place a &eForce Field Generator&r of &eHV level or higher&r in the controller to charge items within the block attached to the &eWireless Charger Cover&r (such as charging the &eChainsaw&r in the &eTree Growth Simulator&r);
Features: Can be installed on &eCrates&r and &ePartial&r machine controllers;
Usage: Install a &6Programmable Cover&r on a &dsingle-block machine&r to send &evirtual items&r to the machine when distributing pattern items.
Features: Allows &ca single&r single-block machine to run recipes for different circuits or molds/dies.
gto.tips.quests.5C62ECF9AC84E023.title: Tangible small board
gto.tips.quests.66A5EC65322E1B8D.descrip: &6Maximum Power&r: The maximum power that the machine can utilize. This value affects the limits of parallel processing and overclocking, meaning it influences &bthe machine's operating speed&r.
&6Maximum Recipe Tier&r: The highest tier of recipes the machine can execute, which affects &bwhether the machine can execute recipes&r.
&eMaximum recipe level (or machine recipe level) and maximum power are two different things—don't confuse them!&r
gto.tips.quests.66A5EC65322E1B8D.subtitl: Why are there two Voltages on my multiblock machine UI?
gto.tips.quests.66A5EC65322E1B8D.title: Maximum power and maximum recipe tier
gto.tips.quests.6A32CEF6BE50FA89.descrip: If the controller can be rotated, use a &6Wrench&r to &eright-click&r the controller to &6rotate&r it, then use the Terminal on it to build the rotated multiblock.
When dealing with oversized multiblocks, you can rotate the controller by &a90 degrees&r to make the multiblock &estand vertically on the ground&r (such as the Assembly Line).
It can also &emirror form&r, simply use the &6Advanced Terminal&r to open mirror mode and build.
gto.tips.quests.6A32CEF6BE50FA89.subtitl: Can the multiblock be placed in other orientations?
gto.tips.quests.6A32CEF6BE50FA89.title: Can't fit...
gto.tips.quests.6E81629D88D0710E.descrip: Once activated, you cannot use cheat commands or take items from EMI.
&eYou will be in this mode forever!&r
&eYou will be in this mode forever!&r
&eYou will be in this mode forever!&r
gto.tips.quests.6E81629D88D0710E.title: Self-discipline Mode
gto.tips.quests.71DC44EE0771E731.descrip: &aDual Hatch Overclocking&r: Installing at least &atwo&r&6energy hatches of the same tier&r (current does not need to be the same) on a multiblock machine triggers &6overclocking&r, allowing the machine to execute recipes at &bone voltage tier higher&r.

Note that the machine's UI displays two voltages: the &6Maximum Power&r voltage is related to &eOverclocking Count&r, while the &6Maximum Recipe Tier&r indicates the &eRecipe Voltage&r that the machine can handle.

&o&7Boosting does not change the power provided by the energy hatch, it only increases the voltage and reduces the amperage. The reason boosting is always achievable is that even the energy hatch with the lowest amperage can provide at least 2A to the machines, so after dual-hatch boosting, it can definitely provide at least 1A of amperage.
gto.tips.quests.71DC44EE0771E731.subtitl: How do I make MV recipes at LV?
gto.tips.quests.71DC44EE0771E731.title: Boost Mechanism
gto.tips.quests.75054AF743DC4A57.descrip: Want to contribute more tips? Leave your mark on QQ group/Discord/GitHub!
gto.tips.quests.75054AF743DC4A57.title: Omission alert?
gto.tips.quests.782023097C32871D.descrip: &6Amplifier&r's effects are very similar to lossless overclocking, increasing power, reducing time consumption, while total energyConsumption remains unchanged. The highest level Amplifier is &eequivalent&r to one lossless overclocking.
&6Energy Module&r and &6Speed Module&r unconditionally &ereduce power&r and &eincrease speed&r, both up to &a0.5x&r
&o&7Amplifiers may draw Amperage exceeding the limit, causing machines to shut down. Please use with caution.
gto.tips.quests.782023097C32871D.subtitl: Amplifier can be dismantled, modules cannot.

gto.ulv.quests.79B4A4120B7B4C60.descript: So let me tell you the key to automated production:
The front of the Heater cannot be blocked. Once blocked, it will &einterrupt heating&r, so we can use this mechanism to control whether heating is on or off.
Secondly, the Heater emits a Redstone Signal with a potency of 14 at 768K, so we can use a &credstone comparator&r to determine whether the Heat meets the requirement.

If the temperature is too high, place a block in front of the heater to prevent overheating. Remove the block once the temperature drops to a suitable range. This task can be handled by &aSticky Pistons&r.

After removing blocks, the Heater will restart the recipes, consuming fuel. Therefore, it is best to use a fuel with a high heat value &6for continuous operation&r until the heat reaches your desired range, and then switch to a fuel with a low heat value.
Finally: When the temperature reaches 800K, it will &4instantly explode&r.

gto.uv.quests.0AD0174C98673F5B.descripti: In subsequent megastructures, you can use these four efficiency hatches to improve machine performance:
&aParallel Hatch&r: Can be used with parallel machines. Allows the machine to process multiple recipes at double the power at once, effectively providing lossless overclocking in a sense.

&aOverclocking Hatch&r: Can be used by some machines. &bUnconditionally&r speeds up machine operations. The number indicates that when the hatch level is &bhigher than&r the recipe level, the recipe time will be multiplied by this percentage. For each level the hatch is &blower than&r the recipe, the speed-up effect is reduced by 20 percentage points.
&aThreading Hatch&r: Only cross-recipe parallel machines can use. Allows machines to run multiple &bdifferent recipes&r simultaneously to maximize parallelism and highest efficiency.

&aOverclocking Hatch&r: Almost exclusively usable by megastructures. Extremely powerful, it can directly &bmodify the machine's overclocking time multiplier coefficient&r. The UV level provides standard lossy overclocking, the UEV level achieves lossless overclocking, and the higher UXV level can reach 4x power and 6x speed, meaning the more the machine is overclocked, the more power-efficient it becomes!
Additionally, the Configurable Maintenance Hatch can also provide a slight machine acceleration effect.
&7&oDon't forget to upgrade your Dash as well.

gto.wireless-energy.quests.0828014567C61: Wireless power grids have a &ebidirectional &rtransmission rate limit. Power generation exceeding this limit cannot be input into the grid, and power exceeding the transmission limit cannot be drawn from the grid

Reminder: The container used to determine the &eMaximum Transfer Rate&r &cdoes not&r actually require electricity input. It is merely a &6carrier&r used to determine the &eCurrent Tech Level&r, not an electrical appliance.
gto.wireless-energy.quests.0EED467C2B883: Before having a &6Energy Storage Substation &r, you can only use &6Battery Boxes &ras &eenergy carriers for the wireless power grid &r

The &eamount and grade of batteries &rin a &6Battery Box &rdetermines the single transmission limit, each battery can provide power equivalent to 1A current of its voltage grade. For example, &64x any small battery &rcan provide &24*32=128 EU/t &rsingle transmission limit

Reminder: The container used to determine the &emaximum transmission rate&r &cdoes not&r actually require electricity input. It is merely a &6carrier&r used to determine the &ecurrent tech level&r, not an electrical appliance.
&nHold the &6Wireless Energy Binding Tool&r&n and right-click on the &6Battery Box&r&n to bind the container&r

gto.wireless-energy.quests.20B8E68273D7D: Thanks to the &ewireless energy system&r provided by GTMThings, employees no longer need to set up the 'Spaghetti Energy Network'

Although &7LV &rstage batteries can make &6Wireless Energy Interfaces &rand &6Wireless Energy Receivers &r, you can only start building a &6Wireless Energy Tower &rafter &bMV &rstage to set up a complete wireless power grid

To use the wireless power grid, you need to build &6Battery Box/Power Substation&r and &6Wireless Energy Substation&r. The former determines your &esingle-block per-tick transmission limit&r, while the latter determines the &egrid capacity&r.

There are more efficient recipes later.
gto.zpm.quests.348156EA1A381ABF.title: &4Wetware Processor Assembly
gto.zpm.quests.34E06CBE6931518C.descript: Have you noticed recipes like &nLuV Force Field Generator&r? They have two identical sets of items, which can cause difficulties for ordered Assembly Lines.
But don't worry! You can try using the &7Naming Mold&r. Place it in the press to rename items, which might be helpful to you.
gto.zpm.quests.34E06CBE6931518C.subtitle: Additional automation steps
gto.zpm.quests.351F704B01567BD7.descript: On &6Glacio&r, sheep have a chance to drop this. You can capture one with a Spiritual Bottle for farming.
Needs &eMultiplication&r production line, primarily used as raw material for &aamplifying&r various cells.
gto.zpm.quests.3709A36606135AF0.descript: Actually, you can skip the &cZPM&r and directly proceed to the &3UV&r.
gto.zpm.quests.3709A36606135AF0.subtitle: Upgrade Your Large Machine #3
gto.zpm.quests.3F041E002D75AB2C.descript: Given your current technological level, you shouldn't mind building a few more farms!
gto.zpm.quests.3F041E002D75AB2C.title: Algae
gto.zpm.quests.488D6BA7A6FC7752.subtitle: Processing Wood
gto.zpm.quests.49E04C29B878D3A8.descript: Don't forget to equip the &bT4&r organ
You might not be able to craft a T4 organ, so find a way to tough it out and bring back a sheep.
gto.zpm.quests.502F7DD0C930D5BF.descript: Raising animals in machines to obtain needed materials
gto.zpm.quests.56164CB7D9300DB3.descript: The Sterile Cleanroom is not a direct upgrade of the Cleanroom, but the Sterile Cleaning Maintenance Hatch is an upgrade of the Cleaning Maintenance Hatch.
gto.zpm.quests.590D044B9C85B84A.descript: Machines that do not require electricity
gto.zpm.quests.59864AA3CB69A3CF.subtitle: Genetic Hodgepodge
gto.zpm.quests.5B5C82819DC2D27A.descript: Finally! Now you can proceed to the &4Wetware&r Processor!
After producing a certain quantity, you should use the proliferation recipe to produce cells.
gto.zpm.quests.5B5C82819DC2D27A.subtitle: Life begins to multiply from here.
gto.zpm.quests.5E32A6DFE04D28F4.title: &4Wetware Processor
gto.zpm.quests.608F56E6A187940C.descript: Actually, almost the entire biological line requires a Sterile Cleanroom.
gto.zpm.quests.63AAABA655725FB9.descript: Press U to view EMI for controlling radiation materials and dosage. Time to test your math fundamentals.
gto.zpm.quests.63AAABA655725FB9.subtitle: Beware of radiation
gto.zpm.quests.65A2C89AD67604DE.descript: You must first use Biochemical Reaction to produce the first &a16&r Bacteria
gto.zpm.quests.65A2C89AD67604DE.title: I need DNA#1
gto.zpm.quests.697AE6FFF1F2D877.descript: It might be nutrients, or it might be Magic... In any case, we need these!
gto.zpm.quests.697AE6FFF1F2D877.subtitle: These creatures are so hard to please!
gto.zpm.quests.697AE6FFF1F2D877.title: Bio-Nutrient
gto.zpm.quests.6DC73D6C2AD17444.descript: &bObviously you've had enough of the &aNormal Assembly Line's &bspeed, it's time to upgrade!
Advanced Assembly Line is the parallel version of Assembly Line, which can use &bHuge Input Bus&r and can be equipped with &eLaser Hatch&r.

Note that blind overclocking is not advisable, because the Advanced Assembly Line is &cover-damage overclocked&r! In other words, &a4x&r power only reduces recipe time to &c0.75x&r, but parallel processing can be settled normally.
gto.zpm.quests.6DC73D6C2AD17444.subtitle: Really advanced... or not?
gto.zpm.quests.717F73B64CA7E035.descript: Absolute Ethanol can be produced through the self-circulation of Ethanol with Zeolite.
gto.zpm.quests.747599D690EADE56.descript: You must first use Biochemical Reaction to produce the first &a16&r Bacteria.
gto.zpm.quests.747599D690EADE56.title: I need DNA#2
gto.zpm.quests.7651697F32169E49.descript: Use the Capturing enchantment to obtain Normal eggs, and acquire Alien eggs through induction.
gto.zpm.quests.7651697F32169E49.title: I need DNA#3

gto.zpm.quests.7FED9F9CC769610C.descript: After creating the initial &a16&r Bacteria, you can begin &ePropagation&r. Animal Cells are simpler and only require &6Spawn Eggs&r.
